Natural History: A volatile acid obtained chiefly from butter

Head: Worries over trifles; impulsive thoughts of suicide; constant state of fear and nervousness
Dull, hazy ache of head
Headache makes him apprehensive about trifles; worse going upstairs or rapid motion
Stomach: Cramps in pit of stomach, worse at night
Much gas in stomach and bowels
Stool accompanied by pain and straining
Back: Pain low down in back and extremities
Tired feeling and dull pain in small of back, worse walking
Pain in ankles and up back of leg
Sleep: Pronounced sleeplessness; dreams of serious nature while asleep

name: Butyric acid
